Package chemistry.death.race.repository

Class GameRepository

java.lang.Object
chemistry.death.race.repository.GameRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.quarkus.mongodb.panache.PanacheMongoRepository<Game>, io.quarkus.mongodb.panache.PanacheMongoRepositoryBase<Game,org.bson.types.ObjectId>
@ApplicationScoped public class GameRepository extends Object implements io.quarkus.mongodb.panache.PanacheMongoRepository<Game>
Repository for the Game collection. Used only for statistics.
